desktop:
[Desktop Entry]
Type=Application
Name=Spotify
Icon=spotify
Exec=/bin/sh -c "docker run --rm -v /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime:ro -v $HOME/.spotify:/home/spotify -v /tmp/.X11-unix:/tmp/.X11-unix -v /run/user/$UID/pulse/native:/pulse -e DISPLAY=unix$DISPLAY --name spotify conman/apps:spotify"Terminal=false
